title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label's height does not update immediately.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new label.
2. Modify the font size of the label to "18 points".

Observed Behavior:
- The font size of the label is changed, but the height of the label does not adjust accordingly.

Expected Behavior:
- When the font size of the label is modified, the height of the label should be justified to accommodate the new font size.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a new label.
2. Edit the font size of the label to "18 points".
3. Observe that the height of the label does not change to match the new font size.
